# cloudyIntell Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-28

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.14+ (from `pyproject.toml`) for backend, TypeScript 5.x for frontend + FastAPI, Pydantic, Uvicorn, LangChain, LangGraph, CopilotKit, React (Next.js), TanStack Query, Tailwind CSS (001-build-cloudyintel-website)

```text

tests/
```
